text.autoconfig.TimestampBro.Title: TimestampBro
text.autoconfig.TimestampBro.option.gene: Toggle chat timestamps on or off.
Set the chat timestamp format using standard SimpleDateFormat patterns (e.g., HH:mm:ss, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm).
Choose the color of the timestamp text.
Text to display normally. Hovering over it will show the timestamp.
Choose the color of the hover text.
